about_the_game:
Alone in the Grey is a first person adventure puzzle game where the player must escape from a UFO they have mysteriously awoke in. Uncover clues and solve puzzles to escape and find out the reason for your capture. Hack terminals and find batteries to obtain freedom.

Alone in the Grey on Steam is an expanded and improved version of the original demo. This new version includes:

  • More content - 300% the size!
  • Improved graphics!
  • More story and lore!
  • Better interaction system!
  • Less bugs! (hopefully)
  • And a lot more!
